page.title: 02HOUSING IN URCHFONT
page.content: URCHFONT IS A QUIET RURAL VILLAGE,THE CENTRE ATTRACTION BEING THE POND WITH DUCKS ENJOYING THE QUIET PEACEFUL SURROUNDINGS. SOME OF THE DWELLINGS HAVE THE GOOD FORTUNE TO BE FACING THE POND. THE HOUSES AND COTTAGES,VARY IN ARCHITECHTURE BUT ARE MAINY BRICK BUILT SOME WITH WHITE WASH WALLS AND THATCHED ROOFS. TUCKED IN BETWEEN SOME OF THE OLDER PROPERTIES IS A SMALL ESTATE OF MODERN BUNGALOWS,THERE IS ALSO A SMALL COUNCIL ESTATE. THE OLDER PROPERTIES SEEM TO HAVE BEEN WELL MAINTAINED BUT KEPT TO THEIR ORIGINAL STYLE. THERE ARE SEVERAL LARGE PROPERTIES WITH EXTENSIVE GROUNDS INCLUDING THE MANOR FARM HOUSE WHICH HAS A GRANARY ELEVATED ON STRADDLE STONES. OTHER FEATURES ARE THE MOUNTING BLOCK ON THE OUTER WALL.
